ivory.smrf.model.score
Class ScoringFunction

java.lang.Object
  ivory.smrf.model.score.ScoringFunction
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryTFScoringFunction, BM25ScoringFunction, DirichletScoringFunction, F2EXPScoringFunction, IDFScoringFunction, JelinekMercerScoringFunction, StreamLengthNormalizedTFScoringFunction, StreamLengthScoringFunction, TFIDFScoringFunction, TFScoringFunction
public abstract class ScoringFunction
extends Object

Abstract base class of all scoring functions.

Don Metzler
